creator: tck@tcknetwork.com
text:
I work on Win32. If I run my server from D:\Server (as service) then in my 
script, when I go backward in the filesystem (using ../) I go directly to the 
root of my hard-disk. Please see the bug report on PHP.

http://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=32644

Thank you to check wether this is a php or apache bug.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text: This isn't a php bug forum.  What you can do within php isn't a concern of httpd.
